title: Mecha Kingdom Orb Bugged
body:
I recently completed the event mission where I had to play 30 games to earn 45 tokens and a Mecha Kingdoms orb. I earned both, but when I went to open the orb in my loot, it was bugged. When I clicked on it, it didn't give me an option to open it. It just said it was an orb. I've left clicked, right clicked, restarted the client, logged out then back in, and its still broken. Here is a picture for reference:

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/513196477938663425/668041439946473482/unknown.png
If anyone knows how I could open the orb, help would certainly not go to waste.

replies.body:
It appears that all the Mecha Kingdoms loot items are at present un-activatable.

I would imagine Riot is already aware, however, given the service status hasn't been updated to reflect it yet you could if you wish, add your voice to the post on the Report a Bug board: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/9KfABZRj-cant-open-mecha-kingdoms-orbs-or-token-shop

Same problem, just after buying the event pass. Clicking the orbs did nothing, and clicking the event tokens did not load the usual list of stuff to buy.
Restarted client, and restarted computer, no change.
The exact thing is happening to me, I just hope I get access to it again before the event ends.
